snippet: Meredith’s New Orleans Cuisine, in Manalapan, is a white-tablecloth restaurant serving food that can soothe a Southerner’s homesickness.
abstract: Karla Cook reviews Meredith's New Orleans Cuisine in Manalapan (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
